edu.cornell.georeference

Class GeoIndexWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cornell.georeference.GeoIndexWriter

  • public class GeoIndexWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps creates indices/directories out of raw data source files
    Author:
    Yang Yang Zheng

                                           java.lang.String indexTargetFilePath)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Build an index/directory if there isn't one at the index file path. It will delete the current existing file at the index file path
        Parameters:
        dataSource - the data source that is used to build the index
        indexTargetFilePath - the file directory to put the index in
        Returns:

        Throws:
